CustomField.description: This calculates the Account's Segment based on the Committed ARR guidelines: 25-75k: Low Touch, 75k-250K Medium Touch, 250K+ High Touch.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This calculates the Account's Segment based on the Committed ARR guidelines: 25-75k: Low Touch, 75k-250K Medium Touch, 250K+ High Touch.
CustomField.label: Account Segment
